scripts.db:add-migration: dotnet ef migrations add --project api/Koudou.Data --startup-project api/Koudou.Api -v
scripts.db:update: dotnet ef --project api/Koudou.Data --startup-project api/Koudou.Api database update -v
scripts.db:clean: docker-compose -f api/db.docker-compose.yml --env-file api/.env down && docker volume prune
